segments.text: I don â€™ t know what activity my son should take part in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many children are learning drawing , dancing , swimming and so on in their spare time . You can follow suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But each children has his own interest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you should talk with your son and let him make his own decision .
segments.speaker: S2
